title: Unban please.
body:
I recently decided to get back into LoL, I updated the launcher and proceeded to put my username and password in, only to be met with Player Banned message advising me to check my emails to verify what had happened.. well I did that and couldn't find a damn thing about it, so the next step was to check my current details.. the email has been changed on the account to a bunch of numbers.. so I cant even change it back, I cant lodge a ticket and I cant get back into the game.. so the next step..... start all over again - haha yeah right, I've spent so much money on my account over the years of enjoying this game. I wish this to be resolved ASAP

Thank You.

replies.body: Hmmmmm that sounds a bit strange that your email may have changed and you not know about it. Sounds like there might be a chance that someone hacked your account, in which case you should reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) asap. When you do, make sure to pick "I need help recovering my account" and you'll be able to submit that ticket without logging in.
